verses.kjv: The word of the LORD came again unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again:

verses.kjv: Son of man, set thy face against the Ammonites, and prophesy against them;
verses.ct: "Son of man, turn against the Ammonites and prophesy against them.

verses.kjv: And say unto the Ammonites, Hear the word of the Lord GOD; Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou saidst, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity;
verses.ct: Tell the Ammonites: Listen to the word of the Lord GOD! This is what the Lord GOD says: Because you said 'Ha!' about my sanctuary when it was desecrated, and about the land of Israel when it was devastated, and about the people of Judah when they were taken into exile —

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I will deliver thee to the men of the east for a possession, and they shall set their palaces in thee, and make their dwellings in thee: they shall eat thy fruit, and they shall drink thy milk.
verses.ct: because of this, I am going to hand you over to the people of the east as their property. They will set up their camps among you and make their homes in your land. They will eat your crops and drink your milk.

verses.kjv: And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the Ammonites a couching place for flocks: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: I will turn Rabbah into a pasture for camels, and the Ammonite territory into a resting place for flocks. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast clapped thine hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because you clapped your hands, stomped your feet, and celebrated with complete contempt over the land of Israel —

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the heathen; and I will cut thee off from the people, and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries: I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: because of this, I will raise my hand against you and hand you over as plunder to the nations. I will cut you off from the peoples and wipe you out from the countries. I will destroy you, and you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because that Moab and Seir do say, Behold, the house of Judah is like unto all the heathen;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because Moab and Seir said, 'Look, the people of Judah are just like all the other nations' —

verses.kjv: Therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities which are on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Bethjeshimoth, Baalmeon, and Kiriathaim,
verses.ct: because of this, I am going to expose the flank of Moab, starting from its border cities — the pride of the country — Bethjeshimoth, Baalmeon, and Kiriathaim.

verses.kjv: Unto the men of the east with the Ammonites, and will give them in possession, that the Ammonites may not be remembered among the nations.
verses.ct: I will give these to the people of the east, along with the Ammonites, as their possession, so that the Ammonites will no longer be remembered among the nations.

verses.kjv: And I will execute judgments upon Moab; and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: I will carry out judgment on Moab, and they will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and hath greatly offended, and revenged himself upon them;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because Edom acted against the people of Judah out of revenge and committed a terrible offense by retaliating against them —

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I will also stretch out mine hand upon Edom, and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; and they of Dedan shall fall by the sword.
verses.ct: this is what the Lord GOD says: I will raise my hand against Edom and eliminate both people and animals from it. I will make it desolate all the way from Teman, and those in Dedan will die by the sword.

verses.kjv: And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel: and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my fury; and they shall know my vengeance, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: I will carry out my vengeance on Edom through my people Israel. They will act against Edom according to my anger and my fury, and Edom will experience my vengeance, declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with a despiteful heart, to destroy it for the old hatred;
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: Because the Philistines acted out of revenge and retaliated with malice in their hearts, trying to destroy because of their ancient hatred —

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will stretch out mine hand upon the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethims, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.
verses.ct: this is what the Lord GOD says: I am going to raise my hand against the Philistines. I will wipe out the Cherethites and destroy whoever remains along the coast.

verses.kjv: And I will execute great vengeance upon them with furious rebukes; and they shall know that I am the LORD, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them.
verses.ct: I will carry out devastating vengeance against them with fierce punishments. Then they will know that I am the LORD, when I bring my vengeance down on them."
